data.title: Roxy's restaurant
data.text: Classy, a bit pricey, but well worth it. The Crab, Lobster Bisque, and Lamb are 5 star meals.  The bread is amazing and made fresh daily. The serve is outstanding. I highly recommend reservations on the weekend.  They also have over 100 specialized Martini's. This restaurant is the best in the hotel.

data.title: Blackjack Rules!
data.text: Didnt win but had a fantastic time during my visit! I was doing ok with "Subo" but then she was replaced by "Tonya" and i got ate.... :( Nonetheless a great time!

data.title: Insulted
data.text: I very rarely visit this casino when I am home from work and without any reason I was informed I was 86 from the property. I was not told why, and the staff was completely rude about it. For what I do for a living I cannot jeopardize my sovereignty to bring unwanted attention to myself, I dont drink nor do drugs and yet I was kicked out for no reason without explanation. I recommend not staying here, try the Grand Sierra or any other hotel outside of The Silver Legacy, El Dorado and Circus Circus because they are the same company and are sure they operate the same way...

data.title: Great casino!
data.text: Eldorado is close to lots of other casinos. There are lots to do here. You can enjoy fine dining, bars, gambling and much more. Never a dual time when you stay here. Great atmosphere.

data.title: So pleasantly surprised!
data.text: Even though we were staying at another casino, we ended up at El Dorado and had such a good experience that we spent much of our weekend here. There were far fewer people in this casino, and those that were here were all in good spirits, fewer kids as well.  We have added El Dorado as our favorite place to game in Reno!

data.title: Nice Casino
data.text: This is a very nice casino with a lot of penny slots, which is what we like to play.  However, we cashed out very few tickets and could hardly ever find a waitress to take our drink order, and we spent a lot of money here.  It's in a very convenient location and it's very nice.  We did not stay in the hotel, we only gambled here.

data.title: I would stay again
data.text: Nice. Neighbors fighting and noisy even for a casino. Security came after a while. The beds were comfy and the rooms were nice and clean. Food was good and the staff was good.

data.title: A great place in Redno to Visit
data.text: A reaaly nice place to stay in Reno to game and stay, all tho the property has sol, and now listed on the stock market it is still a really really  nice place to stay, but advise you go soon before the corp suits change the property which was family owned and run for almost 100 years. Still a great place visit soon before they change the place and then it will be like all the others.

data.title: Lots of slots.
data.text:
Nice place to stay. Great service ,never disappointed. 
The Casino is a good size ,lots of newer slots.

data.title: All in one!
data.text: Love Eldorado which has many amenities and has a place where you can dine in that opens 24hrs, so you have games, food and rooms to choose from, lovely staff, 24/7 security and staff are always ready to assist.

data.title: Nice casino
data.text: We had short time to play in this casino, but got fun here. Staff was friendly and helpful. All slot machine were in good working condition. The casino was very clean.

data.title: Clean and nice
data.text: The casino was very clean the people were very nice an helpful. The hostes were nice the machines worked and were clean. This is a very nice casino

data.title: Good Mix
data.text: Nice mix of old and new games/machines.  Enough options for dining and staff very helpful and friendly.

data.title: Very comfortable hotel. Great reataurants.  Staff friendly and helpful.  Close to downtown and other casinos.
data.text: Revived complementary room for three nights but would have gladly paid for wonderful accommodations. Loved restaurants and casino.  Did not have to leave building when weather was suspect.  Very clean and comfortable  would gladly stay again

data.title: El Dorado Casino
data.text: A great gaming casino. Also a great place to eat at the Buffet. Very clean and friendly. Personnel very helpful.

data.title: Wonderful mix of old and new machines
data.text: If you like the computer gaming experience they take it to a new level. But they sitll have the old style machines if you  want to hear the tumblers.

data.title: Fall Trip to Reno
data.text:
Good variety of slots. Cannot rate the table games since we do not play them. Very clean and decorate .
We had dinner at the Roxy. Very over priced and food very over salted. Saw the show "The Producers". It was just ok.

data.title: Good Casino and good people- Too much smoking!
data.text: I played Roulette and dealers were good. The service( asks for drinks) is good. But, you will see so much smoke(nicotine from cigarettes )

data.title: Carolyn
data.text: Stayed at Eldorado for Street Vibration and was awesome. If you want a good price clean Hotel friendly people Eldorado is the best place to stay and it is in the heart of street vibrations. Awesome view from my room I stayed in a suite with panoramic view of Reno by far the best.

data.title: to see a show
data.text: "Full Monty" which fell flat but the Italian restaurant was awesome.  I had chicken piccada and my husband had veal parm
